name: Whisperdrift
description:
You're a Whispier, a remnant of a creature you once were, but you don't remember what kind. You can be become it once again... if you can prove yourself by reaching the Heart Crystal.

Controls:

  • Left Mouse Button - movement and shooting
  • Right Mouse Button / Spacebar - freeze movement for a few seconds

A game created as part of Gamkedo Club (gamkedo.com)
